scripts.vercel-build: cp -rL docs/snippets/examples docs/snippets/examples-tmp && rm -rf docs/snippets/examples && mv docs/snippets/examples-tmp docs/snippets/examples && cp -rL docs/snippets/examples_sdk docs/snippets/examples_sdk-tmp && rm -rf docs/snippets/examples_sdk && mv docs/snippets/examples_sdk-tmp docs/snippets/examples_sdk && cp -rL docs/snippets/examples_cli docs/snippets/examples_cli-tmp && rm -rf docs/snippets/examples_cli && mv docs/snippets/examples_cli-tmp docs/snippets/examples_cli && cp -rL docs/snippets/examples_sdk_toml docs/snippets/examples_sdk_toml-tmp && rm -rf docs/snippets/examples_sdk_toml && mv docs/snippets/examples_sdk_toml-tmp docs/snippets/examples_sdk_toml && pnpm build
